name: Bunny Blast - Bubble Shooter
description:
The most thrilling bubble shooting arcade game is here! Join the action in Bunny Bubble Shooter and get ready for some real bubble popping fun. Playing is easy! Simply launch bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to the highest score. Have fun, it’s free! you will fall in love with this simple and fun bubble game immediately!


FEATURE!
- If your children always bother you, let them play bubble shooter.
- You can play anywhere and any time.
- Perfect free brain training game, you will never get bored with this puzzle bubble game.


HIGHLIGHTS
• Quick action-filled matches
• Exciting bubbles, power ups and bonuses
• Realistic game physics
• Precise shooting control
• High quality graphics for devices of all resolutions
• A cute bunny! Nothing can beat that!
• Breathtaking visual effects.
• Rescue cute rabbit to crack levels
• Accurate controls and flexibility of bubble swap

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
